sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
article
  container#taxon
    section
      //:src="taxon.avatar"
      img(
      alt="Vue logo"
      :src="taxon.avatar"
      )  
    section
      h1 {{ taxon.value }}
      p Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aenean pellentesque tincidunt felis laoreet laoreet. Mauris vel posuere massa. Quisque auctor commodo scelerisque. Praesent a nisi sollicitudin, tempor elit porttitor, finibus diam. Curabitur eleifend interdum odio et vehicula. Cras sodales porttitor ex et aliquam. In id aliquam sapien. Phasellus gravida ac turpis eu euismod.
  //- h1 {{ taxon.name }}
  h1 Представители:
  container#representative
    section(v-for="animal in taxon.animals")
      //:src="taxon.avatar"
      h1 {{ animal.name }}
      p {{ animal.summary }}
      img(
      alt="Vue logo"
      :src="animal.avatar"
      )  
</template>

<script>
// import { ref } from "@vue/reactivity";
import { loadTaxon } from "@/api.js";
import taxons from "@/taxons.json";
export default {
  // setup() {
  //   const taxon = () => loadTaxon(this.$route.params.name);
  //   return { taxon };
  // },
  data() {
    return {
      taxon: loadTaxon(taxons, this.$route.params.name),
    };
  },
};
</script>
<style lang="stylus" scoped>
container
  // display: inline;
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: left
  color: #2c3e50
  margin-top: 60px
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: flex-start;
  border: 5px solid black;


section
  margin: 15px

img
  width: 500px

container#representative > section
  &> img
    display: block
    transform: scale(100%)
    // width: 200px
    // height: 300px
    border-raduis: 4px
</style>
